attributes.action: Services for young people with mental health conditions eg austism ,ocd ,anxiety
attributes.additional_details: More funding for camhs ,young people are not being treated or seen by camhs , some children need treatment , are suffering , can't access education due to conditions , camhs is ineffective, the system needs funding or to be replaced or GPS given the rights to treat children with medication . Thousands of children aren't being seen or treated with medication or therapy.
attributes.background: To provide a service for young people who suffer from mental health issues , camhs are under funded and under staffed ,thousands of children are going without therapy or medication , local GPS can not prescribe medication for children , it has to come from a psychologist via camhs.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575532
